channel.title: Rick Dykstra
channel.description: Recent news about Rick Dykstra, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Looking forward to coming in this morning for the show. Also debt repayment... "@TheTMCShow: @RickDykstra opens the show after 9am @610CKTB"

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Got on back of truck! @Mama__B: @RickDykstra no kidding. Glad to be watching instead of marching, though. At least you had a roof over you

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: They're Troopers! "@Mama__B: @RickDykstra The rain finished just in time, but it must have sucked for the bands & gymnasts during staging."

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Just about through the Labour Day Parade in Merritton!! Turned out to be a great day for the parade!! http://t.co/OnnYoNc8Dj

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: My good friend Mike Burgess at the end of the parade. Captain Mike is the past pres of the Great Lakes Pilots Union. http://t.co/NvsFM2aU6z

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Rain left and we're having a great parade. Happy Labour Day!! http://t.co/96opWHFPEm

item.title: Mentioned by News Talk 610 CKTB
item.description:
Algoma donates $250 thousand dollars to Performing Arts Centre
St. Catharines MP Rick Dykstra, St. Catharines MPP Jim Bradley, and Mayor Brian McMullan participated in a cornerstone ceremony at the future site on the corner of St Paul and Carlisle Streets. All three have left a permanent stamp in the facility's freshly ...

item.title: Mentioned by Lifesite (blog)
item.description:
Rick Dykstra and dead babies in dumpsters
Member of Parliament Rick Dykstra actually affirmed in 2006 that he recognized that life begins at fertilization and that the law should protect the human rights of pre-born humans. He affirmed after his election that he didn't really care that much because ...

item.title: Mentioned by Bullet News Niagara
item.description:
SPORTS: Puck ready to drop for Hockey Night in St. Catharines 4...
From left, St. Catharines MP Rick Dykstra with Steve Ludzik, presenting the cheque to the United Way of St. Catharines and District following last year's Hockey Night in St. Catharines. (Photo Steve Ludzik). Submitted by event organizers. ST. CATHARINES ...

item.title: Mentioned by News Talk 610 CKTB
item.description:
St. Catharines MP Rick Dykstra says Paul Bernardo will remain in maximum ...
St.Catharines MP Rick Dykstra believes Paul Bernardo's request to move to a medium security prison will never become reality. Dykstra is responding to reports the convicted killer has asked to move to new special housing at the medium-security Bath ...

item.title: Mentioned by News Talk 610 CKTB
item.description:
Seaway Marine in Port Weller files for bankruptcy
St. Catharines MP Rick Dykstra tells CKTB News that he's still gathering information and trying to determine the reasons why Seaway Marine took this step. Dykstra believes there needs to be something along the Canal that can assist the Great Lakes ships ...

item.title: Mentioned by News Talk 610 CKTB
item.description:
A local MP say it's time for Niagara to get its act together and come up with transit ...
St. Catharines MP Rick Dykstra says when it comes to public transit out of Niagara, we are in a transition period while we wait for GO Transit to offer year round rail service to Toronto and pick up the slack from the VIA cuts. Dykstra says in the interim we need ...
